page.title: 19The Mayor's Duties
page.content: Councillor Johnson has been Mayor for 6 weeks but he was Deputy Mayor last year.He never dreamt that one day he would be Mayor.His chain of office is made of gold and weighs about fifteen oz.The Mayor likes attending all the functions he is invited to and he enjoys making speeches if the subject is interesting.He finds it a tiring job as he often has to attend 2 or 3 functions a day and he even has to work on Sundays.One of his favourite functions was our Sports Day.The Mayor doesn't have time to do his hobbies now that he is Mayor but he does like to play bowls.The Mayor's main duties are replying to the letters from the public , going to Council meetings and attending the many functions that he is invited to .
